sentences.en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

sentences.en: He found evidence of mutated forms of the gene.
sentences.cn: 他找到了该基因出现了变异形式的证据。

sentences.en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
sentences.cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

sentences.en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.en: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
sentences.cn: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

sentences.en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
sentences.cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

sentences.en: He was carrying on about some stupid television series.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休地说着某个无聊的电视连续剧。

sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentences.cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentences.cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: He wiped away the blood with a paper napkin.
He'd phoned Laura to see if she was better.
sentences.cn: 他打电话给劳拉看她是不是好些了。

sentences.en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

sentences.en: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.cn: 是他先提出这个想法的。

sentences.en: Somehow he tells these stories without a note of horror.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他讲这些故事时一点都不害怕。

trans.tran_en: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
